title: Mato Grosso do Sul
extract:
Mato Grosso do Sul is a state of the Central Western region of Brazil, and is known for its natural beauties.


Cities

1 Corumbá - cross the border into Bolivia and take the death train to Santa Cruz.
2 Bonito - Lots of rivers where you can go diving, waterfalls and grottos.
Aquidauana
3 Campo Grande - the gateway to the Pantanal, a beautiful region abundant with wildlife and wonderful landscapes.
4 Dourados - second largest city in the state.
Naviraí
Nova Andradina
Paranaíba
Ponta Porã
Sidrolândia
Três Lagoas


Other destinations
1 The Pantanal - Fishing, safari and photography.


Understand
Mato Grosso do Sul literally means "thick southern forest".


Get in
By plane to Bonito Airport (BYO IATA) or Corumbá Airport (CMG IATA).


Get around


See


Do


Eat


Drink


Stay safe
